title: Will Chegg pay me for my edited answers? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, Strictly Not. They are paying you to answer a question. but, if your answer is not up to the mark (or having some errors/discrepancy), then they ask you to edit your answer and post again. They will not pay you again for editing it as you are already paid to answer that question.
Yes, But you should do it once in a blue moon. If you do it frequently then students might take it as spam, if they report the incidence then you will be in trouble.
